thread.title: Denver's defense leads Broncos past Vikings 23-20

author: senh
title: Denver's defense leads Broncos past Vikings 23-20
text: BING NEWS: Denver's defense leads Broncos past Vikings 23-20 DENVER (AP) — Von Miller smothered the loose football after T.J. Ward's sack-strip of Teddy Bridgewater in the closing seconds, sealing the Denver Broncos' 23-20 win over the Minnesota Vikings on Sunday. It was the seventh sack of the afternoon for the ... 10/4/2015 - 1:39 pm | View Link Denver's defense could be the best in the NFL The first-team defense hasn't allowed a touchdown, and the unit as a whole leads the league with 15 sacks that are spread among 12 players. Rookie pass rusher Shane Ray was credited for half a sack in the Broncos' victory at Houston, and he notched his ... 08/31/2015 - 5:56 am | View Link Denver’s Defense Carrying The Load While Offense Struggles With his defense. The Broncos’ starters have allowed just six ... Hillman and Juwan Thompson on the depth chart. Hillman leads the Broncos’ backs with a 7.3-yard average, followed by Anderson (4.6), Thompson (3.4) and Ball (2.6). Unlike Thompson ... 08/30/2015 - 11:07 am | View Link Denver's defense carrying the load while offense struggles With his defense. The starters didn't allow a completion by Colin ... Hillman and Juwan Thompson on the depth chart. Hillman leads the Broncos' backs with a 7.3-yard average, followed by Anderson (4.6), Thompson (3.4) and Ball (2.6). Unlike Thompson ... 08/30/2015 - 10:39 am | View Link Denver's defense leads Broncos past Seahawks 23-20 DENVER (AP) — Kyle Orton led Denver back from a shaky start with two touchdown drives and the Broncos' defense throttled Tarvaris Jackson in a 23-20 win over the Seattle Seahawks on Saturday night.
